mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_INFO VALUES ( board_seq.nextval, #{userSeq}, #{regionSeq}, #{typeSeq}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardAddress}, #{boardOpen}, #{boardDetail}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + (interval '9' hour),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{boardBreak}, #{boardPhone}, #{boardImage})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD_INFO WHERE type_seq = 1 ORDER BY board_seq DESC
mapper.update: update board_info set region_seq = #{regionSeq}, board_title = #{boardTitle}, board_address = #{boardAddress}, board_phone = #{boardPhone}, board_open = #{boardOpen}, board_break = #{boardBreak}, board_detail = #{boardDetail} board_image = #{boardImage} where board_seq = ${boardSeq}
mapper.select: select count(*) from board_info where type_seq = 1
